name: AMBER CAPITAL UK LLP
goal: Amber Capital is a regulated asset manager which manages value-oriented and event-driven strategies in global equity markets with a focus on Europe.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: Measures relating to financial services, in particular asset management, UCITS, AIFMD, Mifid2, capital markets union, prospectus regulation, prudential rules for investment firms.
